channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: This road is in an absolutely deplorable state and given the location of the school it is really dangerous, 27th January
item.description:
Malvern Road, outside Christchurch School. So dangerous. The road is in a shameful state.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Malvern Road, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
In front of 10 Littledown Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Littledown Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Just off the main Cotswold Way (OS Explorer map 179 at approx grid ref 133194) as you turn eastwards off the path and diagonally upwards on another main path towards a private house/track and a Gloucestershire Wildlife information board about Buckholt Wood a couple of hundred metres away. A very large tree (requires a chainsaw, tree is several feet in circumference and about 40 ft high) has fallen and completely blocked the path. It is not possible to go round the blocked path as the tree is so large it continues to block the path for many many metres on either side. You have to be able to climb over not only the tree trunk but also a mass of branches blocking the path to a height of a couple of feet. Most walkers will find it simply impossible to get by., 27th January
item.description:
As stated above. I can't say how long the problem has been there, but the crack in the trunk may be several weeks old only. However, another walker has seen it before but didn't know how to report it! As I've said previously to you this link I'm using is not what comes up if you search on the web for how to report a footpath problem.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Buckholt Road, Cranham, Stroud
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Alleyway that runs, along side of Lakeside school, 27th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Hazebrouck Close, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Pothole repair failed, 27th January
item.description:
This is a continuation of issue 5493522. The fix applied on Friday 26th January has already failed by Saturday 27th January. Cars are once again falling into a sizeable pothole or avoiding it causing them to be in the middle of the road at a tight section.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish on A40 between Gloucester and Cheltenham in line with Churchdown, 27th January
item.description:
The A40 at the section beside Churchdown is a total mess with general litter and flytipping. This time of year would be a great time to clean it before the bushes grow back. No need to close the road, just a rolling lane closure.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Just past Pirton crescent heading up to Churchdown School, 27th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 207, Pirton Lane, Churchdown, Gloucester

item.title: Pothole near drain on Ermin Way, 26th January
item.description:
A pothole has formed near the grid due to flood water persistently running over this spot and increased traffic due to A417 road closures. This is different to incident 5493522 which was logged on 26-Jan, and also resolved 26-Jan but this was not also fixed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Tewkesbury
